interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 7 Wonders Nourishing Leave In Conditioner with Pure Organic Oils of Almond, Marula, Argan, Olive, Macadamia, Coconut & Jojoba 16.9 fl. Oz. Review Date: 2019/07/28 Store: Frulatte Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 3.86 x 2.8 inches; 1.23 Pounds'} Review Text: I first found this product at a discount store. And I’m thrilled to find that Amazon has it so I can never be without it! I have waist-length hair that is kinky curly with gray hair throughout that I wear straightened. This product is the only one that keeps my hair from frizzing no matter how hot and humid it gets! And the shine and softness of my hair is the best it’s ever been. I use it after using It’s A Ten Miracle Silk Leave-In after washing my hair with Wen.

Even if you have long hair, use this stuff sparingly and make sure you liquify it in the palms of your hand and between your fingers before you put it through your hair.

Another plus: the huge bottle lasts me about 6 months. Keep in mind my hair is dry so I only wash it twice a week. Knowing that, you can gauge how long this bottle will last you. Review Title: Best Anti-Frizz Hair Product I’ve Ever Used Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Emphasis:** Prioritizes effective hair care solutions, particularly for managing frizz in humid conditions.
- **Product Preference:** Values leave-in conditioners, especially those enriched with organic oils for nourishment and moisture.
- **Hair Type Specificity:** Has waist-length, kinky curly hair that undergoes straightening; experiences dryness and grays, indicating a need for hydration and care.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Enthusiastic about finding trusted products, exemplified by a willingness to seek out specific brands across different retailers.
- **Usage Habits:** Washes hair twice a week; utilizes products sparingly, indicating a mindful approach to hair care and a focus on longevity in product use.
- **Positive Experience:** Extremely satisfied with previous purchases; seeks high-quality products that deliver visible results, such as shine and softness.
- **Sustainability Focus:** The purchase of products from discount outlets reflects a value for cost-effectiveness and accessibility.

Overall, this user is focused on finding quality hair maintenance products that cater to their specific hair type and conditions, while also valuing longevity and effectiveness.
